trans-unit.source: References <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo" /> objects stored at a different location when using XMLDSIG or XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: 在使用 XMLDSIG 或 XML 加密時，參考儲存在不同位置上的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod> class represents the `<RetrievalMethod>` element for both XML encryption and XML digital signatures.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod>類別代表`<RetrievalMethod>`XML 數位簽章和 XML 加密項目。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod> class to reference the same <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo> information in multiple XMLDSIG signatures or encrypted XML documents, especially when the referenced information is large.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod>類別，參考相同<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo>多個 XMLDSIG 簽章或加密的 XML 中的資訊，特別是當參考的資訊是大型文件。

trans-unit.source: For example, a `<RetrievalMethod>` subelement can be used to reference a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoX509Data> object that contains an X.509v3 certificate chain, which validates the signing key.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`<RetrievalMethod>`子元素可以使用參考<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoX509Data>物件，其中包含驗證簽章金鑰的 X.509v3 憑證鏈結。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `<RetrievalMethod>` element, see Section 4.4.3 of the XMLDSIG specification, which is available from the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/, or see the XML Encryption specification, which is available from the W3C at www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`<RetrievalMethod>`項目，請參閱節 4.4.3 XMLDSIG 規格中，可用於從 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ 在 World Wide Web Consortium (W3C)，或請參閱 XML 加密規格，可從在 www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/ W3C。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the information to be referenced by the new instance of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod" /> 的新執行個體所要參考的資訊之統一資源識別元 (URI)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod" /> class with the specified Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) pointing to the referenced <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用指向受參考的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod" /> 物件的指定統一資源識別元 (URI)，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the information to be referenced by the new instance of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod" /> 的新執行個體所要參考的資訊之統一資源識別元 (URI)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod" /> class with the specified Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) pointing to the referenced <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo" /> object and the URI that describes the type of data to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 使用指向受參考的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod" /> 物件之指定統一資源識別元 (URI)，以及描述要擷取的資料型別之 URI，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Returns the XML representation of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod" /> 物件的 XML 表示。

trans-unit.source: The XML representation of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod" /> 物件的 XML 表示。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement> object returned by this method is suitable for use as a subelement of an XMLDSIG or XML encryption `<KeyInfo>` element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>這個方法所傳回的物件是適用於作為 XMLDSIG 或 XML 加密的子元素`<KeyInfo>`項目。

trans-unit.source: The XML element that specifies the state of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod" /> 物件狀態的 XML 項目。

trans-unit.source: Parses the input <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> object and configures the internal state of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod" /> object to match.
trans-unit.target: 剖析輸入的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> 物件，並設定 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod" /> 物件的內部狀態來對應。

trans-unit.source: This method is typically used to process a `<RetrievalMethod>` subelement of a `<KeyInfo>` element.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法通常用來處理程序`<RetrievalMethod>`的子元素`<KeyInfo>`項目。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="value" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that describes the type of data to be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定統一資源識別元 (URI)，其描述要擷取資料的型別。

trans-unit.source: A Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that describes the type of data to be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 統一資源識別元 (URI)，描述要擷取資料的型別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod" /> 物件的統一資源識別元 (URI)。

trans-unit.source: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod" /> 物件的統一資源識別元 (URI)。
